creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Belgian edition; woman on right in blue and white gown with a pink fan and a white hat with yellow plumes and pink flowers; woman at right in a yellow and blue gown with a walking stick and a yellow hat with purple ribbon; the figures in this plate are similar to two separate plates found in the French edition of this periodical (P.15,195-P.15,197)
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Plate II from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Dix-neuvième Cahier, 20 Mai 1787
